languages.text: Продолжая пылать религиозным экстазом, рабочие перевыполняют нормы, умирая от изнеможения прямо за станками.
Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.
languages.original_text: Продолжая пылать религиозным экстазом, рабочие перевыполняют нормы, умирая от изнеможения прямо за станками.

traits.locale_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.
The madness of pure faith grips the planet's population.
Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.
Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

languages.text: Victimes d'une vague de fanatisme religieux, les ouvriers dépassent leurs quotas et finissent par mourir d'épuisement à leurs postes.
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

traits.locale_text: Victimes d'une vague de fanatisme religieux, les ouvriers dépassent leurs quotas et finissent par mourir d'épuisement à leurs postes.

languages.text: それでも敬虔な狂信観念に支配され、労働者たちはノルマを大幅に超過し、その場で過労死してしまう。
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

traits.locale_text: それでも敬虔な狂信観念に支配され、労働者たちはノルマを大幅に超過し、その場で過労死してしまう。

languages.text: 所有工人都被虔诚的狂热所支配。工人们拼命工作，远远超出了工作量，最终在岗位上筋疲力竭而死。
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

traits.locale_text: 所有工人都被虔诚的狂热所支配。工人们拼命工作，远远超出了工作量，最终在岗位上筋疲力竭而死。

languages.text: Abrumados por el pío fanatismo, los trabajadores superan sus cuotas y mueren por el cansancio en sus puestos.
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

traits.locale_text: Abrumados por el pío fanatismo, los trabajadores superan sus cuotas y mueren por el cansancio en sus puestos.

languages.text: Noch immer von ihrem frommen Fanatismus überwältigt, übertreffen die Arbeiter ihre Quoten und sterben noch an ihren Arbeitsplätzen vor Erschöpfung.
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.

traits.locale_text: Noch immer von ihrem frommen Fanatismus überwältigt, übertreffen die Arbeiter ihre Quoten und sterben noch an ihren Arbeitsplätzen vor Erschöpfung.

languages.text: Hâlâ dindar bir fanatizmin esiri olan işçiler, kotalarını aşıyor ve tam da istasyonlarının başında bitkinlikten ölüyor.
languages.original_text: Still overwhelmed with pious fanaticism, the workers exceed quotas and die of exhaustion right at their stations.
